question.title: Getting ThreadPoolExecutor Error at Tomcat ShutDown - started a thread named [pool-59-thread-8] but has failed to stop it.

node.contents: how about add a check to find main thread is interrupted Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()?

astNode.text: how about add a check to find main thread is interrupted Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted()?

node.contents: I have deployed webApplication on Apache Tomcat/7.0.34

astNode.text: I have deployed webApplication on Apache Tomcat/7.0.34

node.contents: Internal in Application using ThreadPoolExecutor( code as follows )

astNode.text: Internal in Application using ThreadPoolExecutor( code as follows )

node.contents: On production boxes, when try to shuddown servers by /bin/shutdown.sh, process is continue running.
